sources.title: Revolt of the Barbarians
sources.description: In the late Roman Empire, A roman consul is sent to Gaul to investigate the theft of gold shipments. He finds out that the Governor is leading a group of barbarians in the thefts.

metadata.Plot: A roman consul is sent to Gaul to investigate the theft of gold shipments. He discovers that the gold is being stolen by a tribe of barbarians--whose leader is the governor of Gaul.
metadata.Actors: Roland Carey, Maria Grazia Spina, Mario Feliciani
